about_the_game:
Cards of Destiny is a VR puzzle game that brings a frantic tabletop experience to a unique, immersive environment!

PLAY AS A GOD
Turn into a godlike being as you draw one-time-use cards that can BLESS or CURSE the critters on the tabletop – humans and aliens alike!


SEAL THE FATE OF HUMANITY
You need to save the tiny humans from the evil aliens!… Or do you? Like any child playing with toys, sometimes you favor the baddies because it’s fun. Many levels will require you to let some humans die – pay close attention and don’t get attached.


MAGIC CARDS
Every card has a unique effect which can only be used once: turn your hand into a hammer, put out fires with an ice spray, or even spawn in some aliens! But do it quick and get another card right away, or you’ll run out of options!


ADAPT TO DIFFERENT CARDS AND SITUATIONS
It’s an epic battle with many souls on the line – and you have to play the hand you’re dealt! Think carefully about the layout of each level and exactly which cards to play or you’ll fail.


CO-OP CROSS-PLAY
Cards of Destiny supports cross-play multiplayer! With unique puzzles that call for you and your friend to be in total sync, test your co-op skills and play together on Steam, Quest, Pico or PSVR2!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060 6GB / AMD RX 580 or equivalent
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR / Oculus Link

short_description: Cards of Destiny is a VR puzzle game that brings the tabletop experience to a unique interactive environment! Turn your inner child into a god as you draw one-time-use cards that can save or condemn the tiny humans on your desk – and the aliens chasing them.
supported_languages: English, Portuguese - Brazil, Simplified Chinese, Japanese, Spanish - Spain
